content.description: Climb the right most side of the South facing slab.  Start by stepping onto a small natural pedestal and then continue up the slab to the finish.  Great views!!!
content.location: Head towards Gilligan's Island and continue around to the far North side past the "Pirates Cove."  Continue into the "Tortuga Area" by holding a northern course and eventually passing"The Pearl."  Once passed "The Pearl" trend right (North/East) making your way to the top of the largest and most prominent feature that by now should be right before your eyes.  Once on the top you will come upon a nice East facing wall with slabs that face to the south.  Fun place to climb.

content.description: Climb the wild face left of "Bony."  This has only been done once and still needs some cleaning but this is really fun tall line that has spectacular views for the summit!!!
content.location: Head towards Gilligan's Island and continue around to the far North side past the "Pirates Cove."  Continue into the "Tortuga Area" by holding a northern course and eventually passing"The Pearl."  Once passed "The Pearl" trend right (North/East) making your way to the top of the largest and most prominent feature that by now should be right before your eyes.  Once on the top you will come upon a nice East facing wall with slabs that face to the south.  Fun place to climb.

content.description: Start in the scoop just right and around the corner of "Trophy Pedestal."  Climb up the steep arete to a cool match on a plate like hold.  Push for some sloping crimps and slowly rock over on top upper most part of the slab.  So fun!!  Will be better when it sees more ascents and gets cleaner but really fun!!
content.location: Head towards Gilligan's Island and continue around to the far North side past the "Pirates Cove."
